name: Kevin's Famous Chili
description: Beef, red beans, corn, tomato sauce, carots and its slight carpet-flavored seasoning.

name: Dwight's Grilled Boar with Beets
description: Wild boar, beets (from Schrute farm), potatoes, aromatic herbs.

name: Pam's Chocolate Cream Pie
description: Chocolate custard, whipped cream and biscuit base.

name: Stanley's Sacred Pretzel
description: Pretzel dough sprinkled with either salt or sugar
